Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Bills/Texans “highlights” reel doesn’t include OT 3rd & 18 “conversion”, 1 of the game’s biggest plays. Why? Obvious delay of game non-call.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: “Delay of game” is the easiest call to get right every time.  A 10 year-old could do it & if we run out of them it’d be so easy to automate.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: The world will really change to the darker side when deep fake videos retroactively replace all real ones.  Devices are so easily accessed.
